contexts.context: ...in our troupe, though it was our Khajiit tumbler Master <mark>S'Rabba</mark> who he was particularly suspicious of. In fact, the irony...
...suspicious of. In fact, the irony is that he thought <mark>S'Rabba</mark> was a spy for you. Well, you know Khajiit....
...sense of humor. He took some sarcastic comments from Master <mark>S'Rabba</mark> literally, and we all ended up being tortured for information...
...Actually, not all of us were let go. Master <mark>S'Rabba</mark> had apparently died under torture. You have probably had experience...
